bibl.title: Written, Inscribed and Some Decorated Material from Bir Shawish, El-Hayz Oasis.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Earlier textual sources from the Bahriya and El-Hayz Oases. - 3. Papyrological documentation from Bir Shawish: 1. Ostraka [64 fragments]; - 2. Papyri [none!]; - 3. Texts in Coptic [1 likely Coptic inscription on a flagon]. - 4. Other inscriptional material [in part., transport amphora fragment with writing, wine jar with inscriptions]. - 5. Decorated objects. - 6. Concluding remarks. - 7 Bibliography.

bibl.title: Bahriya Oasis. Recent Research into the Past of an Egyptian Oasis.

bibl.seg: Marek Dospěl, Written, Inscribed and Some Decorated Material from Bir Shawish, El-Hayz Oasis.
Marek Dospěl & Lenka Suková (edd.), Bahriya Oasis. Recent Research into the Past of an Egyptian Oasis (Prague, 2013) pp. 91-112, 2 tabl., 14 figg. et pll. coul. II-III.

1. Introduction. - 2. Earlier textual sources from the Bahriya and El-Hayz Oases. - 3. Papyrological documentation from Bir Shawish: 1. Ostraka [64 fragments]; - 2. Papyri [none!]; - 3. Texts in Coptic [1 likely Coptic inscription on a flagon]. - 4. Other inscriptional material [in part., transport amphora fragment with writing, wine jar with inscriptions]. - 5. Decorated objects. - 6. Concluding remarks. - 7 Bibliography.
